short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your study with Kumo: ADHD-friendly tools for focus, motivation, and organisation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inclusive education for all learners!

Introducing Kumo Study - A tool designed to revolutionize the academic journey for students of all kinds, especially those with ADHD. Backed by extensive research and designed alongside ADHD Coaches, psychologists, UX/UI designers and university disability departments, our product is the first of its kind, tailored specifically to address the unique challenges faced by students with ADHD. 

By downloading our tool, you can expect a profound enhancement in focus levels, motivation, and organizational skills. Through our carefully designed user experience , we empower students to stay on track, engage deeply with their coursework, and achieve their full potential. Whether you're a student with ADHD seeking to overcome academic hurdles or a learner striving for peak performance, our tool is your ultimate companion on the path to success. 

Our features include:
    • Weekly Task List – stay organised and improve your goal setting habits with our weekly task list.
    • Collaboration Tools – invite accountability partners to assist in task breakdown.
    • Customisable Pomodoro Timer – increase productivity and focus through our customisable study timer.
    • Site Blocker – stay on task and limit distractions.

Experience the difference firsthand as you unlock a newfound sense of clarity, productivity, and confidence in your academic endeavours. Join the countless students who have already transformed their study habits and elevated their learning experience with our revolutionary tool. It's time to embrace a brighter, more effective approach to studying – download now and embark on your journey towards academic excellence!
